title: Ok guys so WHAT IF: Zilean's Rewind teleported him to his state and location 5 seconds ago?
body:
{{champion:26}} It would go towards making him somewhat less poor of a pick than he is now, and would add interesting wacky spacetime antics to Zil. 

W-Rewind: Zilean channels for 1.5 seconds, then returns himself to his location and state 5 seconds ago, changing his Gold, Mana, cooldowns, summoner spell cooldowns and buff statuses to what they were in that window- everything about Zilean except his Rewind CD goes back 5 seconds.
25 second cooldown.

In lane as when pn low Health, Mana or Cooldowns he could rewind himself to a stronger position, but have to decide between a possibly wasted Rewind going on a 25 second cooldown, or spamming more Time Bombs.

And it couldn't be abused to recall then go back to lane healed, because you regress your Gold and Mana doing so, but you could in theory use Teleport to go to your tower, attack someone, and Rewind back to base, allowing you to Teleport again, but punishing you down the track because now if you use Rewind again 25 seconds later, Teleport will go back to the cooldown it was on 5 seconds before that, so you're punishing yourself slightly.

I'm up quite late so if there's an obvious flaw in this then please tell me. There probably is. But being able to rewind yourself to your previous location sounds like a way of making the Chronokeeper funner-er and actually out of the trash tier winrates. {{champion:26}}
